Sorry, I confused two lines of code:
with 
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite()); 
it works fine!!

> Hallo,
> I would like to run the swingui from within my main method.
> With 
> junit.swingui.TestRunner.startTest(suite());
(That was something wrong I tried) 
> it works fine.
> 
> Is there a possibility to call the swingui instead and pass it a 
Test 
> object returned by suite()?
> Thanks a lot,
> Thomas
